title: Bananas Sometimes
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 41 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: This book builds on student imagination by showing a child envisioning everyday objects as made from bananas. Predictable sentence patterns and pictures support the students as they read.
reviewWords: always, bananas, boats, frowns, hands, pencils, smiles, sometimes, spiders, telephone
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /L/ sound
grammar: Nouns                : Recognize and understand that nouns are naming words
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency words look, like, and to
